actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to prevent the imposition, under part B thereof, of more than one deductible with respect to expenses incurred for the purchase of any particular piece of durable medical equipment.

summary.text: Prevents the imposition, under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, of more than one deductible with respect to expenses incurred for the purchase of any particular piece of durable medical equipment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to prevent the imposition, under part B thereof, of more than one deductible with respect to expenses incurred for the purchase of any particular piece of durable medical equipment.
